CustomField.description: This value is part of the Scorecard calculation that indicates whether you have enough value in the potential pipeline to fill the plan pipeline funnel. It features in the formula: Potential Goal Value = Annual Plan Target x Potential Opportunity Multiplier
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This value is part of the Scorecard calculation that indicates whether you have enough value in the potential pipeline to fill the plan pipeline funnel. It's in the formula: Potential Goal Value = Annual Plan Target x Potential Opportunity Multipli
CustomField.label: Potential Opportunity Multiplier
